channel.title: Spy command or invisible command?
channel.description:
Hey guys. I'm using a Delta 317 base, and was wondering if it is possible to make a command that does one of two things.
Either it makes you completely invisible. This means you're invisible from the minimap, your body is invisible, and people can't see you by hovering their mouse over you.
OR, a command that switches you over to another players screen. For example, if you did ::spyon moparisthebest, you would see the game from that characters screen, without them knowing.
If it's possible, please help.

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Just edit the way the server builds your local player list. If the player is supposed to be invisible, don’t add them to everyone else’s list.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“CookieScape, post:9, topic:394408”]So do you think I should post it in the client help section?[/quote]may help

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

It’d still show on the Minimap as a white dot though, and with RSPS, anything is possible if you use your imagination :P. But seriously, I’d have no idea how to do that.
[/quote]

Ya anything is possible
did you know the ziotic development team create their own runescape buildings litterally
like say the bank
runescape has a certain look and they changed it!
you can change the look of the runescape models somehow just figure it out

Read full topic

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You wouldn’t have to exactly find a particular npc that is glitched if i remember enough from client help sections you could add a .dat file for a npc but not add the monster ints.

Read full topic

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

You’d have to find an invisible glitched NPC and then goto the client and find out how to make it not appear for the minimap.

Read full topic

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

It would take some client sided code to accomplish either of those.

Read full topic

item.title: Spy command or invisible command?
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

party kid:

it would be ::npc #### the # is where the id of monster goes… but in order for you to be invisible you have to pick a glitched npc that doesnt show up on the client. just browse through them i cant remember what id it was.

It’d still show on the Minimap as a white dot though, and with RSPS, anything is possible if you use your imagination :P. But seriously, I’d have no idea how to do that.

Read full topic
